arts.ttl: Leicester back to winning ways at Swansea
arts.sum: Stunning strikes from Jordan James and Abdul Fatawu helped Leicester return to winning ways with a 3-1 victory at Swansea.

arts.ttl: Kristiansen starts: Leicester City team news and predicted XI to face Swansea City
